title: How to Enhance Algo Trading Win Rate with ML - Part 1: Labelling Data
author: Mehdi
summary: In this first part, we improve an algorithmic trading strategy’s win rate by cleaning and relabeling SMA crossover signals. Learn how to backtest, correct labels, and prepare clean data for a machine learning trading model.
seo_title: Improve Algo Trading Win Rate with Machine Learning – Part 1: Labelling Data for Better Backtesting
seo_description: Improve algo trading by relabeling SMA crossover signals. Learn to backtest, clean losing labels, and prep datasets for machine learning to boost win rates.
seo_keywords: algo trading win rate, machine learning trading bot, SMA crossover strategy, relabeling trading data, backtesting crypto strategies, BTCUSDT ML trading
